titles.title: A bill to amend titles XI and XVIII of the Social Security Act with respect to provider appeals of adverse determinations by peer review organizations.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) and part B (Peer Review) of title XI of the Social Security Act to entitle Medicare providers to a reconsideration by a peer review organization of that organization's denial of payment for services provided, and to further review where such reconsideration is adverse to the provider and certain jurisdictional criteria are satisfied.
